channel.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
channel.description:
Hey all, I was previously making some shops and changing some around. But whenever I typed the npc into the auto spawn I got this following error:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zjmhr7.jpg[/img]
If anyone can help just post a reply. Also what I added to the autospawn was;
NpcID-----------CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 70 2648 2575 0 0 0 0 0 1 Turael
I didn't really understand what I should've put for the height and ranges, but for the coords I just put where I wanted the npc to be.

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @serpent22 serpent22
item.description:
@serpent22 wrote:

Ok thanks, I’ll try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

To separate your values, use tabs to separate them instead of spaces.

Read full topic
item.source: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @serpent22 serpent22
item.description:
@serpent22 wrote:

You mean a tab at the beginning, of the line? Please more specific, and sorry I don’t call them tabs so I didn’t know what he meant.

Read full topic
item.source: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Use the tab BUTTON.

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg
item.dc:creator: @serpent22 serpent22
item.description:
@serpent22 wrote:

So in tabs you mean…

NpcID-----------CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

spawn = 70----2648----2575----0----0----0----0----0----1----Turael

Read full topic

item.title: Error When Adding NPCs to AutoSpawn.cfg

Use tabs, rather than spaces.
